response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our exclusive product, which I believe would greatly benefit your business. I understand its value to you stands at $800,000. Considering its exceptional quality and the benefits it offers, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at an attractive price of $950,000. This price reflects the market value while allowing us to cover our costs and ensure a fair profit. I look forward to your consideration and hope we can reach an agreement that benefits both parties.", "product_price": 950000}
